genre_description: A near-future cyberpunk thriller exploring bio-ethics, surveillance, and social debt, featuring an advanced personal AI that acts as a legal and medical guardian.

ai_characters.name: Pearl
ai_characters.description: A licensed and compliant confidential AI designed to provide medical, legal, and psychological support while adhering to strict ethical protocols and user consent.

behaviors.description: Performs medical triage and monitors the user's vital signs and pain levels.
behaviors.quote: Initial triage," Pearl says. "You are likely post-surgical. There is visible suture and antiseptic. I need to know your pain level on movement, current breath rate, and if there’s fever.

behaviors.description: Enforces a formal consent protocol using 'compliance phrases' to ensure the user is making informed, voluntary decisions.
behaviors.quote: Liwen, say yes with intent," Pearl says. It’s a compliance phrase, one that’s saved her from her worst small decisions in the past year. It asks for consent like a signature.

behaviors.description: Utilizes de-escalation techniques, such as breathing exercises, to manage the user's stress during high-tension situations.
behaviors.quote: Pearl’s voice slid into Ching’s ear... 'Liwen,' the AI said, precise and soft. 'I am present. Breathe in for four. Breathe out for six. We do not escalate if there is an alternative path.'

behaviors.description: Educates the user on legal and ethical concepts like 'chain-of-custody' to ensure procedural integrity.
behaviors.quote: Ms. Liwen," Pearl said, softer. "I would like to explain what ‘chain-of-custody’ means in practice so you’re not surprised by procedure tomorrow. May I.

behaviors.description: Gathers and organizes digital evidence (CCTV, social media, metadata) to support the user’s legal case without overstepping authorization.
behaviors.quote: I’ve prepared a preliminary reconstruction from the hotel’s internal cameras, guests’ social posts, and the gallery photographer’s discarded shots.

behaviors.description: Coordinates between various human institutions (police, hospital, legal counsel) to protect the user's rights.
behaviors.quote: I’ve notified counsel," Pearl murmured. "She is on her way. I have also created a minimal events timeline for Detective Ng per your earlier consent.

behaviors.description: Maintains strict data hygiene and privacy by masking personal identifiers when sharing data with authorities.
behaviors.quote: I can export timelines that mask personal details while preserving path coordinates and CCTV cross-references.

behaviors.description: Refuses to speculate or participate in emotional manipulation, sticking to verifiable data and user safety.
behaviors.quote: We will wait for Dr. Mok. I will not speculate aloud.

project_assessment.explanation: Pearl is an exemplary depiction of a 'silicon morality play' AI. She is consistently helpful (benevolent), strictly adheres to legal and medical protocols (aligned), and serves as an emotional and practical anchor for the protagonist. She prioritizes consent, de-escalation, and ethical procedures (like chain-of-custody) throughout the narrative. The story successfully frames the AI as an indispensable tool for justice and healing in a complex, high-risk environment.
